  • GERMANY WIN HOCKEY WORLD CUP FOR FIRST TIME IN 17 YEARS

    https://www.dw.com/en/germany-win-hockey-world-cup-for-first-time-in-17-years/a-64549669

    01/29/2023

    62.5% Shortened!

    Germany beat defending champions Belgium 5-4 on penalties after the game ended 3-3

    Two goals down, Germany roused themselves to surge into a 3-2 lead only for a last-minute equalizer from Belgium to send the final to a shoot-out

    I'm speechless." The triumph is a fairytale finish to a dramatic tournament for Germany

    Two goals in the final two minutes against England took Germany to a penalty shoot-out, which they won to set up a semifinal against Australia

    Extraordinarily, Germany scored two goals inside the final minute to snatch victory from the jaws of defeat and leave Australia stunned

    Five years ago, it was Belgium who held the trophy aloft, beating Germany in the quarterfinals

    ['germany', 'world', 'champion', 'belgium', 'two']

    Germany beat defending champions Belgium 5-4 on penalties after the game ended 3-3

    Two goals down, Germany roused themselves to surge into a 3-2 lead only for a last-minute equalizer from Belgium to send the final to a shoot-out

    I'm speechless." The triumph is a fairytale finish to a dramatic tournament for Germany

    Two goals in the final two minutes against England took Germany to a penalty shoot-out, which they won to set up a semifinal against Australia

    Extraordinarily, Germany scored two goals inside the final minute to snatch victory from the jaws of defeat and leave Australia stunned

    Five years ago, it was Belgium who held the trophy aloft, beating Germany in the quarterfinals

    ['germany', 'world', 'champion', 'belgium', 'two']



  • UK PM SUNAK SACKS PARTY CHAIRMAN ZAHAWI OVER TAX AFFAIRS

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/world/2023/01/29/uk-pm-sunak-fires-party-chairman-zahawi-after-breach-of-ministerial-code

    01/29/2023

    80.65% Shortened!

    Sunak had initially stood by Zahawi before ordering an independent adviser to investigate questions over his tax affairs after it emerged Zahawi had settled a probe by Britain's tax authority HMRC last year

    Sunak's independent adviser Laurie Magnus said that Zahawi didn't declare that his tax affairs were being investigated when he was briefly made finance minister last year, and failed to disclose details when Sunak appointed him to his current role

    it is clear that there has been a serious breach of the Ministerial Code," Sunak said in a letter to Zahawi

    "As a result, I have informed you of my decision to remove you from your position in His Majesty’s Government." Zahawi's response to Sunak did not mention either the HMRC or independent adviser's investigation

    The opposition Labour Party said that Sunak had shown weakness in how he had handled the Zahawi and Raab cases

    Zahawi had characterised reports last July over his tax affairs as "clearly smears"

    ['minister', 'zahawi', 'sunak', 'investigation', 'tax']

  • FOUR DEAD AFTER RECORD FLOODING IN NEW ZEALAND

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/world/2023/01/29/four-dead-after-record-flooding-in-new-zealand/52401

    01/29/2023

    50.0% Shortened!

    About Us Advertise WELLINGTON, Jan 29 — New Zealand police said today a fourth body was found after deadly record torrential rain and flooding devastated Auckland

    Two bodies were found in floodwater at separate locations Friday night in the northern suburb of Wairau Valley, and a third was discovered Saturday after a landslide brought down a home in central Auckland

    Today, a drone operator discovered the body of a man about a kilometre from where he was swept away Friday at Onewhero, south of Auckland

    “The flooding situation has been a traumatic experience for everyone in Auckland,” New Zealand’s deputy prime minister Carmel Sepuloni said at a press conference in the city today

    Friday’s torrential rain also flooded terminals at Auckland airport, which had to be closed before international flights could resume today

    Sir Elton John was forced to cancel concerts in Auckland Friday and yesterday — part of his farewell tour — due to crowd safety

    ['say', 'today', 'body', 'flood', 'auckland']

    The actual celebration would only begin at midnight at Chew Jetty

    "This is my first time in Penang and I will be here for four days

    "There will be a small celebration for families in Chinatown but I had never seen such a big celebration

    "My girlfriend and I are doing a gap year and Malaysia was our first stop

    The last grand celebration was in 2020 before the Covid-19 pandemic hit

    Hokkiens have since celebrated Chinese New Year on a grand scale on the ninth day of the Lunar New Year.

  • HAJIJI TO HELM GAGASAN RAKYAT, ENDING HIS PARTY-LESS STATUS AS SABAH’S CM

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2023/01/29/hajiji-to-helm-gagasan-rakyat-ending-his-party-less-status-as-sabahs-cm/52451

    01/29/2023

    50.0% Shortened!

    About Us Advertise KUALA LUMPUR, Jan 29 — Datuk Seri Hajiji Noor said he now leads Parti Gagasan Rakyat Sabah, also known as Gagasan Rakyat, to end his “party-less” status and strengthen his standing as the Sabah chief minister

    “We will mobilise and further our struggle through Gagasan Rakyat for the benefit of the people

    “Hopefully, after that, there won’t be any dispute about my position as the state’s chief minister,” said Hajiji in a statement released today

    The chairman of Gabungan Rakyat Sabah (GRS) then added that Gagasan Rakyat will be used to continue the struggle as a local party in the state

    He said that Gagasan Rakyat is an existing party that has now been taken over by him and the party was accepted into the GRS coalition on December 9 last year

    On January 6, Hajiji’s position as chief minister was undermined when Sabah Umno chief Datuk Seri Bung Moktar Radin pulled the plug on their relationship with the GRS government, which caused Hajiji to lose the majority he had to form the state Cabinet

    ['hajiji', 'gagasan', 'rakyat', 'sabah', 'party']

    “We will mobilise and further our struggle through Gagasan Rakyat for the benefit of the people

    “Hopefully, after that, there won’t be any dispute about my position as the state’s chief minister,” said Hajiji in a statement released today

    68.42% Shortened!

    The Deputy Prime Minister, who is also the National Disaster Committee chairman, said that the flood situation was under control and only involved several areas in the country

    "Immediate assistance is also being given out to the affected heads of families but we do need to further improve post-flood management and aid," he said

    He said this to the press after meeting with flood victims at the Mersing Politeknik here on Saturday (Jan 28)

    Ahmad Zahid, who is also the Rural and Regional Development Minister, added that he would look into improving the coordination of non-governmental organisations (NGOs) and the relevant agencies involved in post-flood management

    On a separate matter, Ahmad Zahid said that some RM10.5mil had been approved to facilitate short-term initiatives to solve flood problems in Mersing

    "For a long term solution, Mersing will need about RM2.3bil to solve its flood problem once and for all

  • KHAIRY AND SHAHRIL ACCUSE UMNO OF DISCARDING DUE PROCESS IN SACKING, SUSPENSION

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2023/01/28/khairy-and-shahril-accuse-umno-of-discarding-due-process-in-sacking-suspension/52341

    01/28/2023, 19:07

    64.71% Shortened!

    "Yesterday I was suspended for six years by the party Umno, I was never called by the disciplinary board, I never received any letters, I also don't know what reason they used to take this action," he said

    Shahril also suggested that Umno had created excuses to justify his suspension

    "That's why when people say appeal, I think, even if appeal, how to appeal, when even the original procedure did not use the proper procedure, it can't be that when we appeal, it will suddenly be ok?" he asked

    Last night, Umno secretary-general Datuk Seri Ahmad Maslan announced the sacking of former Selangor Umno chief Tan Sri Noh Omar and former Umno Youth chief Khairy Jamaluddin as party members due to alleged breaches of party discipline according to Umno's constitution

    Umno also imposed a six-year suspension of party rights of Shahril, former vice-president Datuk Seri Hishammuddin Hussein, Datuk Maulizan Bujang and Datuk Seri Mohd Salim Sharif

    He insisted that his suspension had not followed the procedure as his meeting with the party’s disciplinary board was due to be held on Monday

    ['shahril', 'noh', 'umno', 'sack', 'suspend']

    "That's why when people say appeal, I think, even if appeal, how to appeal, when even the original procedure did not use the proper procedure, it can't be that when we appeal, it will suddenly be ok?" he asked

  • MINISTRY SCRUTINISES SICK, ABANDONED HOUSING PROJECTS TO PROTECT BUYERS' RIGHTS, SAYS NGA

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2023/01/28/ministry-scrutinises-sick-abandoned-housing-projects-to-protect-buyers-rights-says-nga/52328

    01/28/2023

    45.45% Shortened!

    About Us Advertise IPOH, Jan 28 — The Ministry of Local Government Development (KPKT) will scrutinise every sick and abandoned housing project nationwide, to ensure the welfare and rights of buyers are protected

    Nga, who is also the Kepayang assemblyman, said the Kepayang Ipoh Residency, which consists of 252 apartment units, is one of the sick projects that has been successfully revived and completed; it is also equipped with facilities such as a multi-purpose hall, kindergarten, surau, nursery and playground

    He said apart from Kepayang Residency, PR1MA also has 10 other projects in Perak, including Falim Residency, Kampung Paloh Residency, Meru Residency, and Bandar Baru Setia Awan Perdana Residency

    “In the first 100 days, KPKT aims to complete nearly 5,000 units of affordable housing, including this residency, and several in other states

    He said through agencies under KPKT to date, there are more than 90 affordable housing projects, covering 40,000 housing units, in Perak

    Earlier, there was also the signing of documents of understanding between PR1MA and Koperasi Co-opbank Pertama Malaysia Berhad (Co-opbank Pertama) for the CBP MyPR1MA Housing scheme, which provides home financing of up to 110 per cent, with a rate as low as 3.85 per cent, for property priced between RM 250,000 to RM 500,000 per unit

    ['kpkt', 'housing', 'project', 'say', 'residency']

    About Us Advertise IPOH, Jan 28 — The Ministry of Local Government Development (KPKT) will scrutinise every sick and abandoned housing project nationwide, to ensure the welfare and rights of buyers are protected

    Nga, who is also the Kepayang assemblyman, said the Kepayang Ipoh Residency, which consists of 252 apartment units, is one of the sick projects that has been successfully revived and completed; it is also equipped with facilities such as a multi-purpose hall, kindergarten, surau, nursery and playground

    He said apart from Kepayang Residency, PR1MA also has 10 other projects in Perak, including Falim Residency, Kampung Paloh Residency, Meru Residency, and Bandar Baru Setia Awan Perdana Residency

    “In the first 100 days, KPKT aims to complete nearly 5,000 units of affordable housing, including this residency, and several in other states

    He said through agencies under KPKT to date, there are more than 90 affordable housing projects, covering 40,000 housing units, in Perak

    Earlier, there was also the signing of documents of understanding between PR1MA and Koperasi Co-opbank Pertama Malaysia Berhad (Co-opbank Pertama) for the CBP MyPR1MA Housing scheme, which provides home financing of up to 110 per cent, with a rate as low as 3.85 per cent, for property priced between RM 250,000 to RM 500,000 per unit
